hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#cd ~/ #set -e #sudo chroot firefox-bootstrap /root/run-coverity-upstream.sh
#exit 0 #echo "disabled for now"
cd ~jenkins/
cat > stretch/root/run.sh <<GLOBALEOF set -e set -v if test ! -d /root/firefox-coverity; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/ /root/firefox-coverity fi cd /root/firefox-coverity hg pull https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/ -u
rm -rf obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/ rm -rf cov-int/ rm -rf cov-build.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/:/var/lib/jenkins/.cargo/bin # cargo install cbindgen
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig << EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug ac_add_options --disable-av1 export CC=clang-5.0 export CXX=clang++-5.0 export CXXFLAGS="-I/usr/include/c++/6/ -I/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/c++/6/ -I/usr/include/c++/6/backward/" mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j16" EOF
rm -f third_party/rust/lalrpop/src/parser/lrgrammar.rs
echo "Rebuild all" cov-configure --gcc --force-debug cov-configure --comptype clangcc --compiler clang-5.0
#cov-build --dir cov-int ./mach --log-no-times build -v cov-build --dir cov-int ./mach --log-no-times build cov-analyze --dir cov-int --all
tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=190000
actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity-fx.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi
rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu exit 0
GLOBALEOF
chmod +x stretch/root/run.sh
sudo chroot ~/stretch/ ./root/run.sh # sudo chroot ~/stretch/ ./root/run.sh
